ui:title: StackGuardian Runner Group
ui:description: Create or reference a StackGuardian Runner Group with S3 storage backend and AWS connector. This module manages the platform-side resources needed for private runners.

mode.ui:description: Choose 'create' to provision a new runner group, or 'existing' to use an existing one

existing_runner_group_name.ui:description: Name of an existing runner group on StackGuardian (only used when mode = 'existing')

create_storage_backend.ui:description: Whether to create a new S3 bucket for the storage backend

existing_s3_bucket_name.ui:description: Name of an existing S3 bucket to use (only used when create_storage_backend = false)

force_destroy_storage_backend.ui:description: Whether to force destroy the S3 bucket on module destruction (WARNING: deletes all data)

api_key.ui:description: Your organization's API key on the StackGuardian Platform

org_name.ui:description: Your organization name on the StackGuardian Platform. If not provided, will be extracted from environment.

aws_region.ui:description: The target AWS Region for S3 bucket and IAM resources

runner_group_name.ui:description: Override the runner group name. If empty, uses {global_prefix}-runner-group-{account_id}

connector_name.ui:description: Override the connector name. If empty, uses {global_prefix}-private-runner-backend-{account_id}

max_runners.ui:description: Maximum number of runners allowed in the runner group

runner_group_tags.ui:description: Tags to apply to the runner group on StackGuardian
